channel.title: Wtf were am i?
channel.description:
:eek: :| ;D Another post by Swintell! :o :rolleyes: :cool:
Hello I have switched sources for my swintell server wich is now swintell v2 and I need to know how to add npcs and make them shout i have runescape 3 source =) can ya help me ? if you can thank you if you cant eh its ok =)
ok my servers not up but if my players log in there gonna be like wow....were is all stuff....but in runescape 3 everything good is spread out so everythings not in one area I want to add npcs that say stuff like god wars are near dungeon or click the left door in verik castle to go to worror mini game can you help me?[br][size=1]Posted on: October 10, 2007, 04:51:30 PM[/size][hr]so no one knows i thought this was simple i just dont know how to do it on this server
